question.question: Is the rash on my skin dangerous?

answer.response: Hello Miple, This rash is very common during this time of the year. Just apply some Aloe Vera cream on it and you should be fine. Avoid sun exposure and humidity!
I'm not too sure. Why don't you stop by my clinic sometime?

question.question: I have these odd red spots on my palms. What are they??

answer.response: That is nothing to worry about. It usually happens when people get the flu. It should go away after your flu gets cured

question.question: My back won't stop itching, idk what to do

answer.response: I can take a look at it in my clinic! Please book and appointment and see me at the earliest!
